Banner.Description: Passionate about leveraging technology to drive innovation, I am a versatile professional with data science and software development background. I have hands-on experience in data analysis, artificial intelligence, programming, machine learning, web development, and cloud computing. Let's connect and explore how we can make a meaningful impact together.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a Senior Data Scientist with a strong interest in reinforcement learning and recommendation systems. I stay updated with the latest advancements in these areas and consistently strive to apply innovative techniques to my work.

From enhancing data systems to optimizing performance, I deliver data-driven insights that make a significant impact. My collaborative nature and leadership skills enable me to drive success within diverse teams.

With a proven track record of mentoring and inspiring others, I tackle challenges head-on, bringing fresh perspectives and innovative solutions to every project. I am eager to contribute to a forward-thinking team.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description: Designed and deployed low-latency backend services on AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, SageMaker), achieving p95 less than 100ms and cutting manual validation effort by 15%
Built and supported a retrieval-augmented API service for financial insights; authored ADRs, disaster recovery plans, and integrated Splunk + CloudWatch monitoring
Instituted secure coding practices and automated testing (pytest, Jest) in CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
Delivered a recommendation service via REST APIs, improving promotional targeting by 20% with sub-second inference

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Analyst
Description: Developed and deployed a collaborative filtering engine using Python + SQL, improving targeted promotions by 20% and directly impacting customer conversion rates
Built Tableau dashboards and automated reporting pipelines, reducing manual reporting time by 40%

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Engineered a vehicle test order management app using TypeScript, Angular, Express, and Node, achieving a 97% validity rate
Architected RESTful APIs, reducing server response time by 30% through optimized query handling and efficient load balancing
Led the design of scalable system architecture for vehicle test order manager, reducing database load and faster data access

Experience.Jobs.Title: Research Scientist
Description: Conducted microservices penetration testing with Python and TensorFlow, forecasting threats and conducting fraud prevention
Created datasets from attack telemetry, trained Recurrent Neural Networks model, yielding a 90% accuracy in threat detection
Remodeled a load testing tool to conduct DDoS attacks, identifying 7+ vulnerabilities in microservices
Deployed an open source microservices application on Kubernetes using YAML config files, achieving 100% functionality

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Developed and maintained an e-commerce web app using Django, resulting in significant increase in sales within first 6 months
Utilized Python async programming to process real-time user interaction data, improving ad relevance and user engagement
Refactored legacy systems using design patterns and Git, boosting maintainability and reducing technical debt

FeatureProjects.Title: Highlighted Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TOM
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation Car Test Order Management System application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Revolutionized driver safety technology by analyzing drowsiness detection techniques, specifically focusing on facial features . Identified the most effective method with 95% accuracy

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Crazy Crypto
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built a real-time updating app for prices, news, and graphs of cryptocurrencies, yielding an informative platform. Install this extension to see data in app.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Type-2-Heart Research Paper
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Uncovered novel insights into heart failure risk among diabetic patients using the Random Survival Forest machine learning model, unveiling previously undiscovered correlations with 90% accuracy.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Recommendation System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Content-based recommendation system using machine learning for personalized content suggestions

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Mac OS Calculator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A user-friendly mobile/PC interactive iOS calculator

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Yander E-commerce
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An elegant E-commerce solution for heritage products.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Word Checker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Searches if a word exists in a specific file or not

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: DeathStar
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Cybersecurity project using Convolutional Neural Networks on application built on microservices

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Organize
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Explaining file structure of node.js and Express application

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I would be delighted to hear from you if you're interested in discussing new opportunities.
